name: Notice.AAA6.CP.StrikeOut.HearingFeeUnpaid.Claimant
titleEn: The claim has been struck out
titleCy: Mae'r hawliad wedi cael ei ddileu
descriptionEn: This is because the hearing fee was not paid by ${hearingDueDateEn} as stated in the hearing notice.
descriptionCy: Y rheswm am hyn yw na thalwyd ffi'r gwrandawiad erbyn ${hearingDueDateCy} fel y nodir yn yr hysbysiad o wrandawiad.
